name: MAZE RUNNER (luisbretonjr)
description:
How it feels to be lost? can't find a exit. Very soon you'll know the adventure of MAZE RUNNER.

Mike is in unknown situation to get away from maze, he must find the three orbs that works like a key to unlock the exit. In this way he would need to fight with mysterious enemies whom they won't let him to finish the maze.

mr.bremeltech.com
